column4: my old Max is my wifi hotspot never failing. Ubuntu 12.04 - NO. does not see it. wifi from phone.
my old Macbook sees  my wifi hotspot never failing. Ubuntu 12.04 - NO. does not see it. wifi from phone.
the problem can be with the wifi router installed on your pc
it can also be with the network card
router on my PC??? Does not compute. It's the same PC. I booted from a live CD.
It's the same PC. It's the same network card.
Ubuntu does see the other WiFi hot spots in the neighborhood

what brand is the computer?

as I said. It's a mac book.
